mapper.select: SELECT /* StoreControlMasterOptionalMapper-001 */ business_date, business_end_of_date FROM m_store_control WHERE store_code = #{storeCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* StoreControlMasterOptionalMapper-002 */ m_store_control SET business_date = #{businessDate}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, update_datetime = #{updateDatetime}, update_program_id = #{updateProgramId} WHERE store_code = #{storeCode}
